org.ardenus.input

Interface InputListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ButtonSet, TextBox

    public interface InputListener
    Used to listen for input related events from the input manager.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isShift

        default boolean isShift(int mode)
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode.
        Returns:
        true if the shift key was pressed, false otherwise.

      • isControl

        default boolean isControl(int mode)
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode.
        Returns:
        true if the control key was pressed, false otherwise.

      • isAlt

        default boolean isAlt(int mode)
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode.
        Returns:
        true if the alt key was pressed, false otherwise.

      • isSuper

        default boolean isSuper(int mode)
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode.
        Returns:
        true if the super key was pressed, false otherwise.

      • onKeyPress

        default void onKeyPress(int key,
                        int scancode,
                        int mode)
        Called when a keyboard key is pressed
        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        scancode - the scancode.
        mode - the mode.

      • onKeyRelease

        default void onKeyRelease(int key,
                          int scancode,
                          int mode)
        Caled when a keyboard key is released
        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        scancode - the scancode.
        mode - the mode.

        Called when a button is selected.

        Called when a button is unselected.

        default void onPlayerConnect(Controller controller,
                             Controller oldController)
        Called when a player is connected.
        Parameters:
        controller - the connected controller.
        oldController - the controller that was previously connected in that player slot (if there was one.)

      • onPlayerDisconnect

        default void onPlayerDisconnect(Controller controller)
        Called when a player is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that disconnected.

                                     ControllerButton button)
        Called when a controller button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that pressed the button.
        button - the controller button that was pressed.

      • onControllerButtonRelease

        default void onControllerButtonRelease(Controller controller,
                                       ControllerButton button)
        Called when a controller button is released.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that released the button.
        button - the controller button that was released.

                              GamepadDirection direction)
        Called when a direction is pressed.

        default void onDirectionRelease(Controller controller,
                                GamepadDirection direction)
        Called when a direction is released.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that released the direction.
        direction - the action that was released.
